caption.p: Ordination plots of the canonical correspondence analyses ( CCAs) of plant species composition within each stream (Boye, Groote Molenbeek, Sandemandsbækken, and Voel Bæk). In the CCAs, species composition was constrained by treatment (flood, drought, control), whereas the variation in species composition explained by type of vegetation (seed, existing, and bareplot) and year (2011, 2012, 2013) was partialled out. Trait vectors significantly associated with the CCA axes ( p < .05) are plotted onto the ordination
